attributes.action: I want parliament to maintain the accessibility to private pensions at age 55.
attributes.additional_details: I have worked for 38 years in a heavy labour intensive job and paid my dues for all that time.The ability to take my private pension at a rate at 55 would still have to work full time but could ease back a little.Consecutive governments have taken hundreds of thousands of pounds of my earnings.My private pension is mine not yours.
attributes.background: I want parliament to maintain the accessibility age at 55 as I believe this is late enough in life.
